info.p: "<tiger2/>" is a format derived from Tiger XML and standardised as the serialisation of the SynAF data model, under the signature ISO 24615-2. It is one of the corpus formats that can be ingested into the ANNIS query system.
The format used to be called "ISOTiger" for a while, until ISO decided to disallow the use of its abbreviation in standard names.
